flawed_nl_solution:
There were 800 x 1/5 = <<800*1/5=4000>>4000 parents who agreed to the tuition fee increase.
So, there were 800 - 4000 = <<800-4000=-3200>>-3200 parents who disagreed.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 160, not 4000. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
